name: Serve 'N 'Wich
description:
Welcome to Serve 'N 'Wich, where our mission to make fast food is to make faster food!

You as a new employee will race around assigning customers to seats and getting their food to them the moment they sit down.

With these promises come high expectations, and customers will tip accordingly. Do your best to keep everyone happy and your paycheck high, good luck out there!

DOWNLOAD BELOW!

--------------

Controls

WASD to move.

E to pick up sandwiches and money.

Right click to assign a customer to a booth.

Left click to shoot sandwiches.
